page.title: Serverless : offline인지 Prod인지 구분하기
page.content: Case 1    var dynamodbOfflineOptions = {￼        region: "localhost",￼        endpoint: "http://localhost:8000"￼    },￼    isOffline = () => process.env.IS_OFFLINE;￼    var client = isOffline() ? new AWS.DynamoDB.DocumentClient(dynamodbOfflineOptions) :  new AWS.DynamoDB.DocumentClient();    Case 2(내가 짠 것)    const locationDetermination = (callback) => {        let dynamo = new AWS.DynamoDB.DocumentClient();            console.log('locationDetermination region: ', dynamo.service.config.region);            if(typeof dynamo.service.config.region === 'undefined'){            callback(new AWS.DynamoDB.DocumentClient({                region: "localhost",                endpoint: "http://localhost:8000"            }));        }else{            console.log('if false');            callback(dynamo);        }    }        로컬 Dynamo    [[[[[dynamo]]]]] DocumentClient {      options: { attrValue: 'S8' },      service:       Service {         config:          Config {            credentials: [Object],            credentialProvider: [Object],            region: undefined,            logger: null,            apiVersions: {},            apiVersion: null,                endpoint: 'dynamodb.undefined.amazonaws.com',            httpOptions: [Object],            maxRetries: undefined,            maxRedirects: 10,            paramValidation: true,            sslEnabled: true,            s3ForcePathStyle: false,            s3BucketEndpoint: false,            s3DisableBodySigning: true,            computeChecksums: true,            convertResponseTypes: true,            correctClockSkew: false,            customUserAgent: null,            dynamoDbCrc32: true,            systemClockOffset: 0,            signatureVersion: 'v4',            signatureCache: true,            retryDelayOptions: {},            useAccelerateEndpoint: false },         isGlobalEndpoint: false,         endpoint:          Endpoint {            protocol: 'https:',            host: 'dynamodb.undefined.amazonaws.com',            port: 443,            hostname: 'dynamodb.undefined.amazonaws.com',            pathname: '/',            path: '/',            href: 'https://dynamodb.undefined.amazonaws.com/' },         _clientId: 1 },      attrValue: 'S8' }            AWS Dynamo    {      "options": {        "attrValue": "S8"      },      "service": {        "config": {          "credentials": {            "expired": false,            "expireTime": null,            "accessKeyId": "ASIAIJFF3YJXSK6LBDFA",            "sessionToken": "",            "envPrefix": "AWS"          },          "credentialProvider": {            "providers": [              null,              null,              null,              null            ]          },          "region": "ap-northeast-2",          "logger": null,          "apiVersions": {},          "apiVersion": null,          "endpoint": "dynamodb.ap-northeast-2.amazonaws.com",          "httpOptions": {            "timeout": 120000          },          "maxRedirects": 10,          "paramValidation": true,          "sslEnabled": true,          "s3ForcePathStyle": false,          "s3BucketEndpoint": false,          "s3DisableBodySigning": true,          "computeChecksums": true,          "convertResponseTypes": true,          "correctClockSkew": false,          "customUserAgent": null,          "dynamoDbCrc32": true,          "systemClockOffset": 0,          "signatureVersion": "v4",          "signatureCache": true,          "retryDelayOptions": {},          "useAccelerateEndpoint": false        },        "isGlobalEndpoint": false,        "endpoint": {          "protocol": "https:",          "host": "dynamodb.ap-northeast-2.amazonaws.com",          "port": 443,          "hostname": "dynamodb.ap-northeast-2.amazonaws.com",          "pathname": "/",          "path": "/",          "href": "https://dynamodb.ap-northeast-2.amazonaws.com/"        },        "_clientId": 1      },      "attrValue": "S8"    }
page.html:
Case 1

var dynamodbOfflineOptions = {￼ region: "localhost",￼ endpoint: "http://localhost:8000"￼ },￼ isOffline = () => process.env.IS_OFFLINE;￼

var client = isOffline() ? new AWS.DynamoDB.DocumentClient(dynamodbOfflineOptions) : new AWS.DynamoDB.DocumentClient();

Case 2(내가 짠 것)

const locationDetermination = (callback) => {

let dynamo = new AWS.DynamoDB.DocumentClient();


console.log('locationDetermination region: ', dynamo.service.config.region);


if(typeof dynamo.service.config.region === 'undefined'){

callback(new AWS.DynamoDB.DocumentClient({

region: "localhost",

endpoint: "http://localhost:8000"

}));

}else{

console.log('if false');

callback(dynamo);

}

}


로컬 Dynamo

[[[[[dynamo]]]]] DocumentClient {

options: { attrValue: 'S8' },

service:

Service {

config:

Config {

credentials: [Object],

credentialProvider: [Object],

region: undefined,

logger: null,

apiVersions: {},

apiVersion: null,


endpoint: 'dynamodb.undefined.amazonaws.com',

httpOptions: [Object],

maxRetries: undefined,

maxRedirects: 10,

paramValidation: true,

sslEnabled: true,

s3ForcePathStyle: false,

s3BucketEndpoint: false,

s3DisableBodySigning: true,

computeChecksums: true,

convertResponseTypes: true,

correctClockSkew: false,

customUserAgent: null,

dynamoDbCrc32: true,

systemClockOffset: 0,

signatureVersion: 'v4',

signatureCache: true,

retryDelayOptions: {},

useAccelerateEndpoint: false },

isGlobalEndpoint: false,

endpoint:

Endpoint {

protocol: 'https:',

host: 'dynamodb.undefined.amazonaws.com',

port: 443,

hostname: 'dynamodb.undefined.amazonaws.com',

pathname: '/',

path: '/',

href: 'https://dynamodb.undefined.amazonaws.com/' },

_clientId: 1 },

attrValue: 'S8' }
